Description:
* [Feature] Add GameCube ISO export functionality
  * Click "Save ISO..." to export your game with the selected mods enabled. You do not need the Dolphin paths set. This exports a shrunk ISO (without padding bytes). You can launch the ISO in Dolphin or copy it to storage for use with Nintendont, etc.  Thanks @parhamgholami for a bugfix to GCNTools which made this possible.
* [Feature] Enable dark mode option
  * By default, this uses the system theme. You can set it explicitly to use Dark or Classic under Settings
* You can open the settings file (settings.json) directly through the Settings menu option for quick editing, if needed

Thanks @igorseabra4 and @energydrink02 for localisation efforts
